pages.text: The skull from a charred skeleton in the Nether. This can be used to corrupt Bone armor, improving it greatly. Those who wear the full set of Wither Armor will be hidden from undead around them and have wither resistance.

Wither Skeleton armor can be upgraded even farther, into Wither Soul armor. This is a long and hard process that takes four beceaons to make but the end result is armor stronger than diamond with all the effects of wither armor. Along with the ability to wither those who strike the wearer.
